message.name: ERR_OWNING_RULE_CLASS_MUST_EXTEND_INTERFACE_RULE_CLASS
message.locale: This annotation can only be used on a rule class which inherits from '%1s'.

message.name: ERR_RETURN_RULE_CLASS_MUST_EXTEND_INTERFACE_RULE_CLASS
message.locale: The return type declared on the owning attribute ('%1s') must be a rule class descended from '%2s', or a List of such a rule class.

message.name: ERR_MULTIPLE_RELATED_RULE_OBJECTS_FOUND
message.locale: Multiple rule objects of type '%1s' found for attribute '%2s' on rule object '%3s', but the attribute only expects a single instance.

message.name: ERR_RULE_ATTRIBUTE_ONLY
message.locale: This annotation may only be present on a rule attribute.

message.name: ERR_RULE_CLASS_ONLY
message.locale: This annotation may only be present on a rule class.

message.name: ERR_RNFE_RULE_ATTRIBUTE
message.locale: Rule attribute '%1s' not found on rule class '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_RULE_ATTRIBUTE_MUST_RETURN_TYPE
message.locale: Rule attribute '%1s' must return a '%2s' to be used in this annotation.

message.name: INVALID_ABSTRACT_RETURN_RULES_CLASS
message.locale: Return class %1s must not be an abstract class.

message.name: INVALID_RETURN_CLASS_INITIALIZED_ATTRIBUTES_FOUND
message.locale: Return class %1s must not contain initialization arguments.

message.name: INVALID_CHILD_EXPRESSION_ANNOTATION_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Child expression %1s class does not have an annotation.

message.name: INVALID_CHILD_EXPRESSION_ANNOTATION_NO_START_DATE_ATTRIBUTE
message.locale: Child expression class %1s does not have an annotation start date.

message.name: INVALID_CHILD_EXPRESSION_ANNOTATION_START_DATE_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUND_ON_RULE_CLASS
message.locale: Child expression annotation start date attribute %1s is not found on rule class %2s.

message.name: SPECIFIED_TIMELINE_ATTRIBUTES_NOT_EXISTING_IN_CHILD_EXPRESSION_RULE_CLASS
message.locale: The specified timeline attribute %1s does not exist on the child expression rule class %2s.

message.name: CHILD_EXPRESSION_INVALID_NOT_LIST_RULE_OBJECT
message.locale: The parameter %1s to the combinedSuccessionSet expression is not a list of rule objects.

message.name: INVALID_CHILD_EXPRESSION_NO_ANNOTATION_START_DATE
message.locale: Child expression %1s is invalid. The annotation start date has not been set.

message.name: INVALID_OVERLAPPING_CHILD_EXPRESSION_RULE_OBJECTS
message.locale: Child expression rule object date ranges overlap.

message.name: ERR_SUCCESSION_SET_EMPTY
message.locale: List of evidence rows for the succession set with ID '%1n' cannot be empty.

message.name: ERR_ANNOTATION_NOT_FOUND_ON_RULE_CLASS
message.locale: Annotation '%1s' not found on rule class '%2s'.
